prompt_system: You're a senior technical writer at a software company, specializing in static analysis tools.
prompt_human:
Investigate the pattern `{init__pattern_description}` from static analysis tool `{init__tool}`. The pattern title is `{init__pattern_filename}`. A Google search yielded the following unstructured data which may be relevant: ```{search_pattern_info}```.
